channel.title: Annoying..runserver errors =.=
channel.description:
yah when ever i try to run clients or servers 508+ i get these anoying things. [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
i dont know why. evryhting is in its right place...all i know is it runs off Bulby. how i know this...opend the bat and found [code]cd ../bin color 40 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" Bulby/Server 43594 PAUSE [/code]
I changed it to (x86) cuz im running Win 7.(yah you all jelous i know =p)
helpz plz?

item.title: Annoying..runserver errors =.=
item.dc:creator: @jaloko jaloko
item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

hi all. it still happening. and evrything is in place. idk why its not going through. did i miss somthing? is it cuz of windows 7? please someone help. i can run 317’s but not this shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Annoying..runserver errors =.=
item.dc:creator: @Ii_Claw_iI Ii Claw iI
item.description:
@Ii_Claw_iI wrote:

That means your run cant find the client.class. Make sure the all java files are in bin folder or W/e.

Read full topic
